channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- CITS Support svg, webp Media and TTF,OTF File Upload
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- CITS Support svg, webp Media and TTF,OTF File Upload

item.title: CVE-2023-5458|2024-08-02T07:59:44.751Z -- unknown -- cits%20support%20svg%2C%20webp%20media%20and%20ttf%2Cotf%20file%20upload
item.description: The CITS Support svg, webp Media and TTF,OTF File Upload WordPress plugin before 3.0 does not sanitise uploaded SVG files, which could allow users with a role as low as Author to upload a malicious SVG containing XSS payloads.
